The Investment Manager will invest at any time at least two-thirds (2/3) of the Portfolio's total assets in such securities, and may invest up to one-third (1/3) of total assets in Euro- or European currency-denominated fixed-income securities of non-European issuers.","hsbcCategoryCode":"EF","hsbcCategoryName":"European Fixed Income","dividendYield":6.66534,"distributionFrequency":"Monthly","riskLvlCde":"3","currency":"AUD","expenseRatio":1.36,"marginRatio":null,"initialCharge":2,"annualManagementFee":1.1,"assetsUnderManagement":1749989696,"assetsUnderManagementCurrencyCode":"USD","topPerformersIndicator":null,"topSellProdIndex":"N","investmentRegionCode":"EU","investmentRegionName":"Europe","channelRestrictList":["SI_I"],"fundClassCde":"WIC","amcmIndicator":"N","nextDealDate":"2025-08-13","surveyedFundNetAssetsDate":"2025-08-12","riskFreeRateName":"USTREAS T-Bill Auction Ave 3 Mon","relativeRiskMeasuresIndexName":null,"dayEndBidOfferPricesDate":null,"dayEndNAVDate":"2025-08-12","prodStatCde":"A","allowBuy":"Y","allowSell":"Y","allowSwInProdInd":"Y","allowSwOutProdInd":"Y","allowSellMipProdInd":"Y","annualReportDate":"2024-08-31","piFundInd":null,"deAuthFundInd":null,"weekRangeLowDate":"2025-04-09","weekRangeHighDate":"2024-10-18"}}}
